trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_SEQ_00<tab>Lyse is not sure what to make of Isari.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_TODO_00<tab>Search for villagers in need of aid.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_TODO_01<tab>Speak with one of the Confederates.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_TODO_02<tab>Report to Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERA02489_000_000<tab>Ugh... My back, my back...
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERB02489_000_005<tab>Don't hurt me, please! I swear, I didn't do anything!
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_PIRATE02481_000_010<tab>Heh heh. Saw the smoke, did you?
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>They didn't follow you, did they? I gave you enough time to escape?
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_ALISAIE_000_016<tab>Good, good... And don't worry─I'll try not to make a habit out of it.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_LYSE_000_020<tab>Something definitely happened here. I see several people who look like they might be injured. Let's give them a hand and find out what we missed.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>Hm? Do <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> need help? Oh, I'll be fine. It's nothing that won't heal. You should go after Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>Ugh... What was it Thancred once said about battle scars and maidens? Naught worth repeating in polite company, I'm sure...
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_LYSE_000_035<tab>I see. I'm glad Soroban reached you in time...
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_PIRATE02490_000_040<tab>The captain scoffed at first, but Tansui convinced him to at least muster our forces...
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERA02489_000_050<tab>Thank you, my child. When the fighting started, I tried to run and hide, but fell and could not regain my feet...

TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERA02489_000_051<tab>I thought for sure that we would all be slaughtered, but the pirates drove them off! I never thought I would see the day when the Confederacy came to our aid!
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERA02489_000_052<tab>Thank you for your concern, but I shall be fine. There is no more need for running, after all!
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERB02489_000_055<tab>Uwaaaaaah! Oh, you're not an imperial. Is...is it over?

TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERB02489_000_056<tab>Kami be praised! I was certain she would have us all killed and burn Isari to the ground─or kill us after making us watch, or barricade us in our homes before putting them to the torch...

TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_VILLAGERB02489_000_057<tab>We had heard stories about the viceroy, but that was the first time any of us had seen her in the flesh...and I should be glad if I never see her again.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_PIRATE02481_000_060<tab>I remember you! You're the one who saved me from the Doman catchers!

TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_PIRATE02481_000_061<tab>Thanks to you, we managed to rescue the fishermen and my kidnapped comrades─one of whom joined the Confederacy with me long ago. It would've broken my heart to have had to bury him...
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_PIRATE02481_000_062<tab>Oh, and if you're looking for the captain, you'll find him in the tavern.
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_PIRATE02481_000_063<tab>You should've seen it! The captain was a bleedin' whirlwind of death!
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>Back already? What have you learned?
TEXT_STMBDA314_02490_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>At the tavern, you say? In that case, we should find Lyse and speak with him together.
